item.title: VALKYRIES Project Kickoff
item.description: On November 5th 2021, the Project coordinator, Juan-Román Martínez Arranz, will present the VALKYRIES Project at the round table “Horizon Europe and civil security for society” that will take place at the International Defense Fair (FEINDEF) in Spain.

item.title: VALKYRIES Project Kickoff
item.description: Today, #VALKYRIES Project Kickoff Meeting has been held, with the participation of all consortium members
